reviews.review_msg: Rosemary is such a good prof. She tries to answer as many questions as she can and tries to learn students names. There are only 3 assignments for the whole semester and each are simple/ straightforward and very interesting. I did well on the exams without reading most of the readings, however you have to attend and take good notes during lecture

Rosemary is a great lecturer, she is super engaging and fun. She is always willing to answer questions, even if it means the class runs longer than expected. Grading is fairly weighted and her assignments are manageable. Super interesting course content once all the ground work is laid down.
Rosemary is passionate about the subject and easily accessible by email/office hours if you have any questions - course content was interesting too. Lots of assignments but reasonable for a W course

Rosemary is an amazing Professor and person! Idk why anyone would give her less than 5 stars. This class was probably the most inspirational class I have taken in my university experience leading me to explore more topics on decolonization and what it means. She tries very hard to learn each students name and gives good feedback to answers. i <3 u

Rosemary is such a wonderful human being! It's a W class, so be prepared for lots of reading and writing. But she's always accessible if you need extra help, and gives good feedback for ideas and writing (along with the TA's). Super inspirational class, and would love to take more geography classes with her!

Rosemary is such a sweet professor. She is so passionate abt what she teaches its so fun listening to her lectures. HEAVY CONTENT. Attend lectures bc she only posts lecture outlines. one of the few 2 hr lectures that i can get thru w/o losing focus, thats how interesting her lectures are and also bc she doesnt post detailed slides haha.

Rosemary is very passionate about the courses she teaches. She only posts lecture slide outlines, so I would recommend attending every class or you'll miss a LOT of important content. Tests had hard fill in the blank questions, but the rest was fairly easy if you studied.
Rosemary is one of the best professors at SFU. Very interesting material, super passionate and fun. Talks fast but is happy to go over any concepts again with you. Take a class with her!!
Talks really fast and seems cluttered, clear lecture notes that get posted, The TA's are the best, were very good markers and were helpful.
